Title: “He’s a Jerk and There’s a Payroll Problem”
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:     

  •  A leader in a company who has to deliver bad news to the owner, who is also his girlfriend’s dad
  • A business owner wondering how to share profit with his team
  • A business owner who is discouraged by making over $1,000,000 but not having any profit
  • How to structure benefits and pay to attract and retain team members
